name: tm80
effect: Teaches Rock Slide to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Rock Slide to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
Large boulders are hurled at the foe
to inflict damage. It may also make the
target flinch.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
Large boulders are hurled at the foe
to inflict damage. It may also make the
target flinch.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
Large boulders are hurled at the foe
to inflict damage. It may also make the
target flinch.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
Large boulders are hurled at the
opposing team to inflict damage. They 
may also make the targets flinch.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
Large boulders are hurled at the
opposing team to inflict damage. They
may also make the targets flinch.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
Large boulders are hurled at the opposing
Pokémon to inflict damage. This may also
make the opposing Pokémon flinch.

Large boulders are hurled at the opposing Pokémon
to inflict damage. This may also make the opposing
Pokémon flinch.

Large boulders are hurled at the opposing Pokémon

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
Large boulders are hurled at the opposing Pokémon

flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
After making its attack, the user rushes back to
switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.
